about_the_game:
Top tier spell book series: Physical spell assisted super strategy

True Five Thunderbolts: Cooldown: 4 rounds. A god level spell that can easily guide and control lightning over a wide range and distance, with a greater probability of causing the enemy to faint. It is a terrifying ability that can make one tremble at the slightest sound.
Tsunami: Cooldown: 4 rounds. Terrifying full screen skills! Summoning a tsunami to impact all enemy forces can make opponents agile and descend.
Divine Fury: Skill cooldown: 3 rounds. God's anger! Must hit, damage is affected by attacks and bursts.
Devouring Heaven and Earth: Skill cooldown: multiples of 3 are available for turns. Sacrifice the Eastern Emperor Bell and take the lives of a large number of enemy troops.
Kunlun Mirror: Skill cooldown: 5 rounds. Use Kunlun Mirror to enhance the mobility of our entire army.
Divine Power One Shot: Skill cooldown: 3 rounds. Xiliang's unique marksmanship is extremely powerful and can penetrate multiple enemy forces. Damage is affected by attack power and morale.
Fuxi Cloud Piercing: Skill cooldown: 2 rounds. Playing the Fuxi qin with force, the sound of the qin transforms into a spear, causing damage to a large number of enemy troops in a straight line. Must hit, damage is affected by attacks and bursts.
Fuxi Slash: Skill cooldown: multiples of 4 can be used in turns. Playing the Fuxi qin with intention, the sound of the qin turns into an arrow, continuously damaging any enemy on the entire screen. Must hit, damage is influenced by mental state.
Fuxi Duanqing: Skill cooldown: can be used in multiples of 3 rounds. Play the Fuxi qin with emotions, the sound of the qin turns into a net, control multiple enemy troops, and recover after 2 rounds.
Eight Formation Diagram: Skill cooldown: 4 rounds. Surround enemy troops with a stone formation consisting of eight gates: physical, health, injury, Du, scenery, death, shock, and opening, providing various influences.
Gale Blade: deals 0.6x (our attack enemy defense)+0.4x (our burst enemy burst) damage to enemies within a 2-grid range, causing chaos to the enemy.
Note: If you have purchased but have not claimed this DLC, please enter the "Start Game" interface of Steam Han Wu Emperor Zhuan. There is a "Manage My DLC" in the lower right corner of the interface. Remove all other checkmarks and only keep the hook for this DLC and the content addition package DLC to enter the game and claim it. After receiving it, check the other DLCs. Only one operation is required, and once successful, all archives will be permanently valid.

The original value of this gift pack was 3000 RMB, but it has been sold with a broken bone and there are no further discount activities.
Official QQ group: 985109086 (there are strategies and senior chess players to communicate in the group)
